author: Sam-Harper
body:
Dear All,

This is the miniAOD V2 PR in a 9_4_X flavour.  For more details please see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22308

It mostly involves adapting the Energy Scale & Smearing code to be able to put it into the pat::Electron. I freely admit, the design is not the best, I had to work with what I had. 

This PR does two things
1) enables 2016/2017 IDs in the miniAOD and also stores the bit maps of the cuts for the cut based IDs, everything is embeded in pat::Electron,pat::Photon as well as removing all old IDs. This is the more or less trival bit
2) enables scale and smearing to the miniAOD

This PR will not compile until  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22302, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22303 are merged as it depends on them. 

This PR will not run until I figure out how to get data files in EgammaAnalysis/ElectronTools/data. There is no repo for this in cms-data, who do I contact to deal with that.  The files are at https://github.com/ECALELFS/ScalesSmearings for reference. 

I'm now going to run a large scale test of this. I've been testing with
`cmsDriver.py miniAOD-prodData -s PAT --eventcontent MINIAOD --runUnscheduled --data  --filein file:/opt/ppd/month/harper/dataFiles/DoubleEG_Run2017E_AOD_304144_LS90to91_LS629to631_LS961to963_A479BAD3-69D3-E711-AE6D-FA163E41AF41.root --conditions  --era Run2_2017  --nThreads 8 --scenario pp --conditions 94X_dataRun2_ReReco17_forValidation --no_exec -n -1 `
and things look fine.
